name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with a comprehensive understanding of CRM, DMS, and Decision Support Tools, leveraging 9+ years of experience in the tech field. Skilled in utilizing Condition Monitoring and Plant Asset Management systems to enhance sales productivity. Proficient in MS Office suite and adept at developing Strategic Account Plans to drive B2B sales. Proven track record of collaborating effectively with diverse teams to deliver tailored solutions that meet client needs. Original strengths include a solid foundation as a .NET Full Stack Developer with extensive knowledge of **microservices architecture**, **distributed systems**, and technologies such as **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**.
